alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Northumberland; Richmond (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:09PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MIDDLESEX...SOUTHEASTERN NORTHUMBERLAND...SOUTHEASTERN RICHMOND AND LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lancaster, or near Kilmarnock, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Wicomico Church around 815 PM EDT. Kilmarnock around 820 PM EDT. White Stone around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lara, Byrdton, Browns Store, Somers, Weems, Regina, Mollusk, Alfonso, Senora and Slabtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
